19  LeastSquaresLattice::LeastSquaresLattice(matrix_row<Dmatrix>& LearnData, matrix_row<Dmatrix>& WhitenData, unsigned int P, double lambda, unsigned int D)
20  :
21  mOrder(P),
22  mLwsp(2 * mOrder + 1),
23  mLambda(lambda),
24  mLast(6, mOrder + 1),
25  mDirection(D),
26  mStep(0),
27  mLSLlearn(mOrder, mLambda, mLwsp) {
28  mLSLlearn.execute(LearnData, WhitenData);
29  }
